extensionDescription.message: Shows you the content of cached drafts on MDN pages

noticeStart.description: Start of the MDN message telling you that you have a draft.

linkName.description: Text content for the link to show the content of your draft.

lastSavedRevision.description: Heading for the last saved revision in the comparison page, and label for the corresponding radio button.

cachedDraft.description: Heading for the cached revision in the comparison page, and label for the corresponding radio button.

comparison.description: Heading for the comparison of the 2 revisions in the comparison page, and label for the corresponding radio button.
